pullRequest.title: Fix incompatible features exception message
pullRequest.bodyText:
Addresses #10142
Ex: server.xml with mphealth-1.0 mphealth-2.0

Ex: server.xml with jsf-2.2 cdi-1.0 cdi-2.0 mphealth-1.0 mphealth-2.0

nodes.bodyText:
Change
"The singleton features {0} and {1} are incompatible with each other and they cannot be installed at the same time."
To
"The {0} and {1} singleton features are incompatible with each other and they cannot be installed at the same time."

Could make this one line
InstallException ie = create(msg, e);

Could make this one line
InstallException ie = create(sb.toString(), e);

Could make this one line
InstallException ie = create(msg, e);

commit.message: Add safety checks before creating exception
